name: Weird Place In The Caves
description:
A game by Morfy.

Music by Joshua McLean.

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

All chapters are playable, but for the best experience, play them in order. And ignore the "ignore" chapter. That one isnt playable.

If you experience some shakiness in the webplayer, try this upload of the game: https://morfy.itch.io/weird-place-in-the-caves-alpha
